com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.registration
Class HostAppWidgetInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.registration.HostAppWidgetInfo

public class HostAppWidgetInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The widget info class describes a host application widget. The information is retrieved from the Registration.Widget table.

Constructor Summary

          Create a host application widget info object.

Method Detail

getId

public long getId()
The ID of the widget. Is populated from the android.provider.BaseColumns#_ID field of the Registration.Widget table.

Returns:
The ID.

getCellWidth

public int getCellWidth()
The width of a cell in pixels. Is populated from the Registration.WidgetColumns.CELL_WIDTH field.

Returns:
The cell width.

getCellHeight

public int getCellHeight()
The height of a cell in pixels. Is populated from the Registration.WidgetColumns.CELL_HEIGHT field.

Returns:
The cell height.

getMaxWidth

public int getMaxWidth()
The maximum width of a widget in pixels. Is populated from the Registration.WidgetColumns.MAX_WIDTH field.

Returns:
The maximum width.

getMaxHeight

public int getMaxHeight()
The maximum height of a widget in pixels. Is populated from the Registration.WidgetColumns.MAX_HEIGHT field.

Returns:
The maximum height.

The display mode

Returns:
the mDisplayMode
